Articles.Content:
Hello !

As you may know if you've been a member of the forum since 0.13, I used to be very active on this forum.

Now, I barely post at all, and don't play KSP as often. This is for various reasons.

I plan to get back on the forums soon, but I was wondering, could my account be deleted if I am inactive for to long ?
To the best of my knowledge, that has never happened, with the exception of old accounts that never actually posted anything. As long as you've got a few posts, you should be okay.
